sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; export const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return (

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not Rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} {price}{" "} /per/person/ {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/*========================tour reviews section start ====================== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map((reviews) => (

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

))}
{/*========================tour reviews section end ====================== */}
); };
